transArray.content: The room is clean, well-equipped, and the wireless Internet speed is also very fast. The water in the shower is very comfortable and the water temperature is very suitable. The front desk service was very attentive and it was a very satisfying stay.
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
